RITIKA PALVAI 
                      ritikapalvai21@gmail.com • +1(217)610-0805 • www.linkedin.com/in/ritika-palvai
 
 
 
Professionals Summary 
Dynamic professional with a master’s in Management Information Systems (MIS) and expertise in business analysis and 
data-driven decision-making. Skilled in leveraging AWS technologies like Docker, Kubernetes, and EKS to deliver scalable, 
cloud-based solutions.With experience as a business analyst and SAP functional consultant, I excel in translating complex 
business needs into actionable solutions. Proficient in tools such as SQL, JIRA, Tableau, and Power BI, I specialize in extracting 
insights, designing impactful visualizations, and driving strategic initiatives. Committed to bridging the gap between business 
and technology, I deliver measurable results by applying technical proficiency, cloud computing expertise, and analytical 
acumen. 
 
Work Experience

and technology, I deliver measurable results by applying technical proficiency, cloud computing expertise, and analytical 
acumen. 
 
Work Experience 
● Business Analyst                                                                                                                                                          May 2022 - July 2023 
Capgemini Technology Services, Bengaluru, India 
 
➢ Managed end-user tickets in an SAP support project within the Financial Services Business Unit at Capgemini, 
ensuring prompt issue resolution and clear communication with stakeholders to minimize downtime. 
➢ Leveraged AWS services to develop scalable cloud-based solutions, complementing SAP systems and 
enhancing overall operational efficiency. 
➢ Conducted requirement gathering and documentation, collaborating with cross-functional teams to align 
business needs with technical solutions and organizational goals.

➢ Conducted requirement gathering and documentation, collaborating with cross-functional teams to align 
business needs with technical solutions and organizational goals. 
➢ Utilized JIRA to track project activities, timelines, and statuses, ensuring transparency, effective task 
prioritization, and on-time delivery of project milestones. 
➢ Applied SQL queries for data mapping and verification, supporting accurate data integration and 
reporting across business processes. 
➢ Executed User Acceptance Testing (UAT), validating solutions against business requirements and 
ensuring high-quality deliverables aligned with client expectations. 
 
● Associate Functional Consultant                                                                                                         September 2020 - August 2021 
Vistex Asia Pacific Private Limited, Hyderabad, India 
 
➢ Managed customer and product-related data for a Pan-Asian retail client, ensuring accuracy and seamless operations

Vistex Asia Pacific Private Limited, Hyderabad, India 
 
➢ Managed customer and product-related data for a Pan-Asian retail client, ensuring accuracy and seamless operations 
within the SAP SD module. 
➢ Acted as an L1 support resource, addressing end-user tickets and queries through root cause analysis, 
troubleshooting, and resolving functional issues within defined SLA, while documenting solutions for future use. 
➢ Utilized Salesforce Ticketing System to manage incident lifecycles, track resolution progress through weekly 
status reports, and maintain transparency in project updates. 
➢ Monitored background jobs and collaborated with the Basis team to address failures, ensuring uninterrupted 
system operations and proactive issue management. 
➢ Worked closely with end users and cross-functional teams, facilitating effective communication and aligning 
solutions with business requirements to deliver seamless operations.

➢ Worked closely with end users and cross-functional teams, facilitating effective communication and aligning 
solutions with business requirements to deliver seamless operations. 
➢ Enhanced expertise in SAP SD configurations, system integration, and ERP workflows by resolving functional 
issues, managing master data, and conducting UAT to validate system stability and compliance with business 
objectives. 
 
● Intern                                                                                                                                                                      February 2020 - April 2020 
Vistex Asia Pacific Private Limited, Hyderabad, India 
 
▪ Underwent practical training in the SAP Sales and Distribution module, gaining hands-on experience in configuring 
and customizing SAP SD to meet business requirements, including sales order management, pricing, and distribution 
workflows, as well as managing customer and material master data.

RITIKA PALVAI 
                      ritikapalvai21@gmail.com • +1(217)610-0805 • www.linkedin.com/in/ritika-palvai
 
 
 
Technical Skills 
Programming: Python, SQL 
Tools: Amazon Web Services (Docker, Kubernetes, EKS), Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Visio,  Microsoft Excel, ARIS, Tableau, 
SAS Enterprise Miner, JIRA,, Salesforce Ticketing System 
ERP: SAP ECC & S/4HANA (SD) 
 
Education 
University of Illinois at Springfield | CGPA – 3.97/4.00                                                                                                            Springfield, USA                 
Master of Science in Management Information Systems                                                                                                          December 2024                 
  
● Courses: Fundamentals of Business Analytics, Data Mining, Management of Database Systems, Management 
Information Systems, System Analysis and Design, Project and Change Management, Information Security,

Information Systems, System Analysis and Design, Project and Change Management, Information Security, 
Business Process Modeling and IT Governance, MIS Design/Research Methods, Data 
Communications/Networking. 
 
Keshav Memorial Institute of Science and Technology | CGPA – 7.3/10                                                                            Hyderabad, India                 
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science                                                                                                                                          July 2020 
● Graduated First Class with Distinction. 
 
Certifications 
● Certified in Architecture of integrated systems - ARIS. 
● Completed Business English Certificate (BEC) from Cambridge University, Preliminary level with Grade A. 
● Completed Business English Certificate (BEC) from Cambridge University, Vantage level with Grade A.

● Completed Business English Certificate (BEC) from Cambridge University, Vantage level with Grade A. 
● Completed a 12- week course on Joy of Computing using Python conducted by Indian Institute of Technology, Madras 
and received a Silver+Elite Certificate with a consolidated score of 75%. 
● Awarded Certificate of Appreciation from Capgemini, for meritorious performance in the JEE Cloud AWS Training 
program conducted by Exceller Academia. 
 
Academic Projects 
● Data Mining and Business Analytics Project: Predicted car prices and identified significant car segments using 
regression, decision tree, neural networks, and cluster analysis. Leveraged SAS Enterprise Miner for data modeling, 
evaluation, and actionable insights in the automotive industry. 
● Decentralized Smart Healthcare System Project: Designed a decentralized healthcare platform using blockchain and 
IoT for secure patient data management and real-time health monitoring. Managed project requirements, risk

IoT for secure patient data management and real-time health monitoring. Managed project requirements, risk 
assessment, and prototype development within a DAO-based governance model. 
 
Publications 
● Impact of Big Data Analytics in Cybersecurity" – Published as part of the MIS 523C Fundamentals of Business 
Analytics course (Dec 2023), exploring its role in threat detection, behavioral analysis, and vulnerability management. 
● "Data Valuation and Its Impact on Cybersecurity Strategies" – Published as part of the MIS 577C MIS Design/Research 
Methods course (May 2024), highlighting adaptive security frameworks, privacy challenges, and technological 
integration. 
 
Extracurricular Achievements 
● Recognized as "Best Speaker" and won multiple awards in inter-school and inter-college competitions, including 
Aikyatha Fest (2013-2014) and Horlicks Wizkid 2014. 
● Held leadership roles as Minister for Science and Technology in the school council (2014) and contributed to the

Aikyatha Fest (2013-2014) and Horlicks Wizkid 2014. 
● Held leadership roles as Minister for Science and Technology in the school council (2014) and contributed to the 
college magazine KMITRA, showcasing strong communication and organizational skills.
